name: instagram-follower-scraper
title: Instagram Follower Count Scraper
description: Scrapes follower counts specifically from Instagram profiles. Fast, reliable, and easy to use.

input.title: Input schema
input.description: Configure which Instagram URLs to scrape for follower counts

urls.title: Instagram URLs to scrape (one per line)
urls.description: List of Instagram profile URLs to scrape for follower counts (one URL per line)
